config.normalizer.title: Normal1.8zer Settings
config.normalizer.update.title: §aUPDATE AVAILABLE!
config.normalizer.update.text: A new update to Normal1.8zer has been released & is now available
config.normalizer.tooltip.restoreSneakin: Reverts sneaking hitbox to the pre-1.9 height.
config.normalizer.tooltip.disableSwimmin: Turns off the new swimming mechanics.
config.normalizer.tooltip.disableBedBoun: Disables the bouncing feature on beds. Good for Bedwars.
config.normalizer.tooltip.fixSneakDesync:
Fixes §eMC-159163§r (which produces the double sneaking bug)
§4MAY RESULT IN FALSE BANS, USE AT YOUR OWN RISK
config.normalizer.tooltip.restoreLegacyB: A port of the old pre-aquatic (<=1.12.2) water/lava buckets; §crequires Minecraft restart.
config.normalizer.tooltip.restoreSprintC:
Fixes §eMC-152728§r

Restores sprint canceling when you do actions that slow you down
& should cancel your sprint (eg: eating, blocking).

This was restored in 1.21.4 but was reverted in 1.21.5 after community backlash
config.normalizer.tooltip.serverWhitelis: List of servers that the mod is enabled on.
config.normalizer.tooltip.multiplayerOnl: Limits the mod to only Multiplayer servers.
config.normalizer.tooltip.fixSneakDesync: Shows a warning on server join if you have §lFix Sneak Desync§r enabled.
club.polarite.normalizer.sneakDesyncFixW:
§cNORMAL1.8ZER §4You have enabled the Sneak Desync Fix, which is known to flag some anticheats.

§lPROCEED AT YOUR OWN RISK!

§4To disable the fix, run §b/normalizerconfig§4 and toggle the setting.
